message: Hi Bob, I have an exclusive product that I believe you will find invaluable. I'm offering it to you for $2000000. Let me know if you're interested or if you have any counteroffers in mind. Looking forward to hearing from you!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. However, $2000000 is beyond my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $1200000 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
